SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT CONCAT( '第', ( @i := @i + 1 ), '周' ) AS 'text', COUNT( r.id ) num, DATE_FORMAT( r.create_date, '%x年-第%v周' ) WEEK, GROUP_CONCAT( r.id ) ids, '0' apply_type FROM `dj_house_construction_record` r, ( SELECT @i := 0 ) AS init WHERE r.house_id = #{houseId} AND r.apply_type NOT IN ( 1, 2 ) GROUP BY WEEK ) UNION ALL ( SELECT ( CASE
WHEN r.apply_type = 1 THEN CONCAT( wt.NAME, '阶段完工' ) ELSE CONCAT( wt.NAME, '整体完工' ) END ) AS 'text', COUNT( r.id ) num, DATE_FORMAT( r.create_date, '%x年-第%v周' ) WEEK, GROUP_CONCAT( r.id ) ids, r.apply_type FROM `dj_house_construction_record` r INNER JOIN dj_core_worker_type wt ON wt.type = r.worker_type WHERE r.house_id= #{houseId} AND r.apply_type IN ( 1, 2 ) GROUP BY r.id ) ) a ORDER BY a.WEEK
